Data views extensible.PanelEvents (Entrées calendrier)

extensible.PanelEvents (Entrées calendrier)¶

No help_text for extensible.PanelEvents

Inherits from lino_xl.lib.cal.Events

Every row of this data view is a Entrée calendrier.

User Guide: Not yet written.

Columns

  • ID (id) : See ID.

  • Début (start_dt) : See Début.

  • Fin (end_dt) : See Fin.

  • Résumé (summary) : See Résumé.

  • Description (description) : A longer descriptive text.

  • Traîté par (user) : The responsible user.

  • Local (room) : See Local.

  • Calendrier (calendar) : See Calendrier.

  • Link URL (url) : See Link URL.

  • journée entière (all_day) : See journée entière.

  • Rappel (reminder) : See Rappel.

Toolbar actions

  • HTML (show_as_html) : Show this table in Bootstrap3 interface

  • Table (landscape) (as_pdf) : Show this table as a pdf document.

  • Table (portrait) (as_pdf_p) : Show this table as a pdf document.

  • Export to .xls (export_excel) : Export this table as an .xls document

  • None (grid_post) : See (unformatted: <lino.core.actions.CreateRow grid_post>).

  • None (grid_put) : See (unformatted: <lino.core.actions.SaveGridCell grid_put>).

  • Nouveau (insert) : Open a dialog window to insert a new Entrée calendrier.

  • Créer (submit_insert) : Create the record and open a detail window on it

  • ⚇ (duplicate) : Duplicate the selected row.

  • Détail (detail) : Open a detail window on records of courses.

  • Supprimer (delete_selected) : Supprimer cet enregistrement

  • Imprimer (do_print) : The action used to print this object. This is an instance of DirectPrintAction or CachedPrintAction by default. And if lino_xl.lib.excerpts is installed, then set_excerpts_actions possibly replaces do_print by a lino_xl.lib.excerpts.CreateExcerpt instance.

  • Effacer la cache (do_clear_cache) : Defines the Clear cache button on a Printable record.

  • Modifier le modèle d’impression (edit_template) : Edit the print template, i.e. the file specified by Printable.get_print_templates().

  • ⚔ (show_conflicting) : Show events conflicting with this one.

  • Aujourd’hui (show_today) : Show all calendar events of the same day.

  • Fichiers téléchargés (show_uploads) : Opens a data window with the uploaded files associated to this database object.

  • Check data (check_data) : See (unformatted: <lino.modlib.checkdata.models.UpdateMessagesByController check_data ('Check data')>).

  • Céer courrier (create_mail) : Creates an outbox mail and displays it.

  • Réparer les problèmes de données (fix_problems) : See (unformatted: <lino.modlib.checkdata.models.FixMessagesByController fix_problems ('Réparer les problèmes de données')>).

  • None (grid) : See (unformatted: <lino.core.actions.ShowTable grid>).

  • None (open_help) : Open Help Window

  • Prévisualisation (preview_publication) : See (unformatted: <lino.modlib.publisher.mixins.PreviewPublication preview_publication ('Prévisualisation')>).

  • Update events (update_events) : Update all events of this series.

  • Update presences (update_guests) : Populate or update the list of participants for this calendar entry according to the suggestions.

  • None (validate) : See (unformatted: <lino.core.actions.ValidateForm validate>).

  • Enregistrer (submit_detail) : Enregistrer les changements dans ce formulaire

Paramètres de filtrage

  • Période du (start_date) : Start date of observed period

  • au (end_date) : End date of observed period

  • Évènement observé (observed_event) : See observed_event.

  • Rendez-vous (show_appointments) : Whether only appointments should be shown. « Yes » means only appointments, « No » means no appointments and leaving it to blank shows both types of events.

  • Guest (presence_guest) : Show only entries that have a presence for the specified guest.

  • Traîté par (user) : Show only entries having this user as author.

  • Assigned to (assigned_to) : Show only entries assigned to this user.

  • Bénéficiaire (project) : Show only entries assigned to this project, where project is defined by lino.core.site.Site.project_model.

  • État (state) : Show only entries having this state.

  • Local (room) : See Local.

  • Type d’entrée calendrier (event_type) : Show only entries having this type.
